options.content:
# Note
This dashboard requires a JMX agent reporting statistics from a Kafka Java producer into Prometheus.

⚠️ This dashboard has some sample thresholds, this example is not meant to fit all use cases nor is it meant for production. Think of it as a learning tool to help you become comfortable with the metrics and thresholding.

panels.description: The average time in ms a request was throttled by a broker.
panels.title: Average produce throttle time

panels.description: Average compression rate across all producers
panels.title: Average Compression Rate

panels.description: The average number of bytes produced per second
panels.title: Bytes produced rate

panels.description: The average number of records produced per second.
panels.title: Rate of records produced

panels.description: The average number of bytes produced per topic per second.
panels.title: Bytes produced rate per topic

panels.description: The average number of records produced per second per topic.
panels.title: Rate of records produced per topic

panels.description: The number of produce requests per second.
panels.title: Produce request rate

panels.description: The average time taken for a produce request.
panels.title: Produce latency
